summary: v1.0 - Quiver darker - Red glow on arrow
descriptionHtml:
v1.0

Quiver darker
Red glow on arrow

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod is my first one then I hope you will appreciate it.
As a purist, I didn\'t do so many changes.
I\'m waiting for your advice if there is any problem.
Endorse if you like it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Install:
Extract the file in C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

How to Uninstall:
Delete daedricarrow files in C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\daedric
author: Ciam
